metadata.title: CVE-2020-11721 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: load_png in loader.c in libsixel.a in libsixel 1.8.6 has an uninitialized pointer leading to an invalid call to free, which can cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
